snippet: The Absa Group, a South African subsidiary of Barclays, has agreed to buy the retail credit business of Edcon, an African store chain owned by Bain Capital.
abstract: The Absa Group, a South African subsidiary of Barclays, has agreed to buy the retail credit business of Edcon, an African store chain owned by Bain Capital.

headline.main: Barclays Unit to Buy South African Retail Credit Business for $1.2 Billion
